mapper.select: select user_idx, email, nickname, file_idx, emote_color_idx, social_id, (select count(*) from userfollow where user_idx = #{userIdx}) as following_count, (select count(*) from userfollow where target_user_idx = #{userIdx}) as follower_count from mainuser where user_idx = #{userIdx} and is_deleted = 0;
mapper.sql: select f.feed_idx, f.file_idx, f.user_idx, u.nickname, f.update_date, ifnull((select count(*) from feedcomment where f.feed_idx = feed_idx and is_deleted = 0), 0) as comment_count, ifnull((select count(*) from feedlike where f.feed_idx = feed_idx), 0) as like_total_count from mainfeed f join mainuser u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx
mapper.select: where f.user_idx = #{userIdx} and f.is_deleted = 0 and f.is_public = 1;
select f.follow_idx, f.target_user_idx, f.user_idx, u.nickname, u.file_idx from userfollow f join mainuser u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx where f.target_user_idx = #{userIdx} and u.is_deleted = 0;
select f.follow_idx, f.target_user_idx, f.user_idx, u.nickname, u.file_idx from userfollow f join mainuser u on f.target_user_idx = u.user_idx where f.user_idx = #{userIdx} and u.is_deleted = 0;

select c.calendar_idx, c.calendar_date, e.file_idx, c.user_idx from feedcalendar c join feedemotecomplete e on c.emote_complete_idx = e.emote_complete_idx where user_idx = #{userIdx} and month(calendar_date) = #{month};
select follow_idx from userfollow where target_user_idx = #{targetUserIdx} and user_idx = #{userIdx};
mapper.delete: delete from userfollow where target_user_idx = #{targetUserIdx} and user_idx = #{userIdx};
